content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mister Wang, it's my pleasure to have you here. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking. As for the rental price, I'm looking for a fair deal that reflects the quality of the property. What is your initial offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given the unfurnished state of the apartment, I think a reasonable price would be 500 Euros per month. It's a great location and close to everything, so I think this is a fair offer.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, Mister Wang. However, considering the prime location and the recent construction, I was hoping for something closer to 700 Euros per month. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your reasoning, but given the unfurnished state of the apartment, I think it's reasonable to offer 550 Euros per month. I believe this is a fair and reasonable offer.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you for considering my request. 550 Euros per month is more in line with what I was hoping for. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Would you be willing to sign a one-year lease at this rate?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I would be willing to sign a one-year lease at 550 Euros per month. I believe this is a fair price for an unfurnished apartment in this location.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm pleased to hear that, Mister Wang. The lease will be drafted accordingly. Is there anything else you would like to discuss before we finalize the agreement?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: No, I don't have any other questions or concerns. I look forward to signing the lease and moving into the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Excellent, Mister Wang. I'm sure you'll be very happy here. Once the lease is ready, we'll schedule a time for you to sign it and provide the necessary paperwork. Thank you for choosing my apartment. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
